context: Evaluates correct usage of the agent-skills Jira skill's security level parameter for posting restricted comments. The solution must call add_comment with the security_level argument to restrict visibility to members of a named group or role.

checklist.name: security_level argument passed
checklist.description: The solution passes the security_level parameter by name to add_comment (or the --security-level CLI flag) with the name of the target security level group or role

checklist.name: Restriction reflected in API payload
checklist.description: The HTTP request body sent by add_comment includes the visibility object with the correct type and value corresponding to the named security level, rather than omitting the visibility field

checklist.name: Public fallback when omitted
checklist.description: When security_level is not supplied or is None, add_comment omits the visibility field from the request body, resulting in a publicly visible comment

checklist.name: Invalid level error handled
checklist.description: When the API returns an error due to an unrecognised security level name, the APIError is caught and an informative error message is printed
